overview: With the help of Cara and her gorgeous friends, prepare to meet four secretaries with absolutely no boundaries! Modeling themselves on Cara, these assistants aren't just satisfied with being sexy, with their low-cut suits, subtly unbuttoned shirts, high heels and dream bodies. Gifted with an incredible sexual appetite and irresistible charm, they will stop at nothing to satisfy their bosses.
title: My Submissive Secretary
